definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to lift oneself out of poverty
to rise from poverty and become prosperous (idiom)/poverty alleviation
to help the poor/almsgiving for the needy/to assist poor households or poor regions

sentences.english: They believe that the absence of the remaining mean that the coming year would be poverty.
sentences.chinese: 他们以为，倘若没不足下的酒肉，来年便会贫窭。

sentences.english: B lamb is as dear to a poor man as an ox to the rich.
sentences.chinese: 贫平易近眼中的一只羊，贵似富人一头牛。

sentences.english: Flashback is one of the major problems in lean premixed combustion of gas turbine combustor.
sentences.chinese: 回火问题是贫燃料预混燃烧面临的主要问题之一。

sentences.english: The poor man wants much, the miser everything.
sentences.chinese: 贫平易近要求多，财迷则样样都要。

sentences.english: Economy is the poor man' s mint; and extravagance the rich man ' s pitfall.
sentences.chinese: 节省是贫平易近的造币厂，华侈是富翁的陷阱。

sentences.english: One is metal rich and relatively massive with large gravity, while another metal poor with lower mass and surface gravity.
sentences.chinese: 另一类贫金属星，其质量和表面重力都相对偏小。

sentences.english: Do not through fear of poverty surrender liberty.
sentences.chinese: 不要由于怕贫窭而舍去自在。

sentences.english: It is quite difficult to explain the problem to the amingestedurs.
sentences.chinese: 向初学者解释清楚这个问题是比较贫窭的。
她的服装贫适合那种场合。

sentences.english: The time when I first met him wa spinod unnaturnumalwaysr one ingly difficult period of my life.
sentences.chinese: 第一次见到他的时期是在我平生中万分贫窭的时期。

sentences.english: Economy the poor man's mints; extravagance the rich man's pitfall. (Martin Tupper. American economist. )
sentences.chinese: 节省是贫平易近的造币厂，华侈是富人的陷阱。

sentences.english: Such so-called "metal-poor" stars weren't believed to have the right stuff to produce planets.
sentences.chinese: 天文界普遍认为这样贫金属星是不可能形成行星的。

poor and with low expectations/poverty stunts ambition
